meta.title: Free Online OCR Converter – Convert Image & PDF to Text

meta.name: description
meta.content: Use this free online OCR converter to copy text from images and converts them to an editable format.

div.p: Extract text from Images, PDFs, and Documents with one click.

div.p: Drop It Like It's Hot

div.h3: Drag and drop feature that give us best experience.

div.span: Edit your good preview on cardy
Easy to use like playing game

img.p: We have the best online OCR tool that converts image to text using A.I techniques.
Convert unlimited pictures into text with no daily limit.
Our free online OCR converter can get a text from scanned documents, low-resolution photos, or even math expressions.
Download word file or copy text from the image with just one click.

div.h2: How to use Free online OCR converter?

div.p: We are going to discuss that how you can use this best OCR online free tool to extract text from images:

ul.li: Drag and drop Image to the input field
Or you can also upload a file from your device
You can copy the text or download it as a docx or .txt file.

div.p: OCR.best is an AI-based tool that converts images and PDFs into editable text accurately. Use this online OCR converter to extract text from images for free. With this ocr converter online, you can convert image to text at one click and its totally free.

div.h2: What is an online OCR translator?

div.p: Online OCR translator is a tool that allows you to translate images, PDFs, and documents into text for free. It compares objects from the image with objects from the tool's database at a microscopic level. Our Image OCR tool takes advantage of advanced OCR technology to make comparisons. Its core recognition program is powered by two of the best machine-learning libraries, TensorFlow and Scikit-learn.
Extracts data from structured docs

img.p: A template is used to target extraction points

div.p: Extracts data structured docs with some variations

img.p: ML is used to help fit documents into a template soan OCR can process it

div.p: Extracts information from unstructured docs and images

img.p: ML finds, extracts, and cleans extraction points (template -free)

div.p: There were the times when we needed to retrieve data from the images and the process of writing every word from an image was a hectic task. AI OCR online tool is developed as a solution to this problem. All you need to do is upload the specified image, and this OCR photo to text converter will convert it to text in a matter of seconds.

div.h2: Why do we need online OCR converter?

div.p: Using an AI online OCR free tool for OCR picture to text conversion improves the process of automation. It makes our tasks more hassle-free as well as error-free. The tool will help decrease your efforts and increase your productivity especially when you have to convert bulk images to text. The good thing about Image to free ocr online converter is that you can convert photos to text by just uploading the OCR image online with a single click. This OCR free online converter provides a simple interface for converting image to text. Credit should be given where it’s due, our dedicated team of developers did an outstanding job by developing the recognition algorithms to achieve 100% accuracy.

div.h2: How does free online OCR work?

div.p: In terms of the technology used in this tool, OCR and machine learning are employed to convert images to text. OCR stands for optical character recognition and it works by identifying the objects (characters) in an image using optical technology. Whether it's a computer-printed document or handwritten paper, OCR can read it especially when it's working together with the AI. You can upload your image or drag and drop the image. It automatically converts the image into text when you upload it.
Hundreds of Image to OCR tools are available on the internet, but some noticeable features set this tool apart from others.
Below are the prominent features of this tool:
Free of cost

When this online ocr image to text converter is completely free, there is no reason to pay for the premium conversion tools. All you need is a smart phone or computer and an active internet connection to access this tool. This OCR scanner online does not even require registration or sign-up as we provide instant access to it.
Powered by Artificial Intelligence

Because of the AI integration in the free online ocr converter, the tool is extremely accurate. The machine learning algorithm helps this best online free OCR image to text tool to correctly recognize poorly written text because it facilitates a better understanding of the object. The AI-based online ocr to word converter is always a better option for converting handwritten assignments into digital format as well as converting old printed documents into editable Word Doc,Docx formats.
Supports multiple languages

Our OCR tool supports multiple languages. You can extract text from an image written in various languages including English, Spanish, Deutsch, русский, Português, čeština, Svenska, Polskie, Netherlands, Français, Indonesian, Română, ไทย, Italiano, Gaeilge, Dansk, 한국어, Norsk, Tiếng Việt, Arabic. Using our OCR tool in these languages not only helps extract text written in the relevant language but also makes it easier for users to understand the interface better in their native language.
Text can be downloaded
After converting a picture into text, the tool offers three options to save the text.

li.p: Copy the text in your clipboard
Save the text in Txt Format
Save the text in Doc/Docx format

div.p: You can click on the download button once you've converted your image into text and your download will begin immediately.
Multiple picture format

You don’t need to convert your image into a specific format because this tool supports several formats like JPG, JPEG, JPI, etc. The formats which are offered by this ocr online image to text tool are:
Security assurance
We do not store any images that are converted through this online ocr scanner. Your data is 100% secure and all images are automatically deleted from our database right after the conversion.
Maximum Accuracy

Equipped with advanced technology, the online ocr to text is completely error-free and offers high accuracy. You got handwritten notes or images from your camera, there is no need to worry. Just try out this tool to get whatever text your images hold.

div.h3: How can I convert images to text free?

div.p: OCR.best's online image to text OCR online converter lets you easily transform any image into text without paying for it. All you have to do is upload the image and copy the text.

div.h3: How do I convert a picture to normal text?

div.p: If your picture has some text and you want to copy this text, an online ocr translator is helpful in this scenario. It will instantly convert the image into text with better accuracy.

div.h3: How do I extract text from a screenshot?

div.p: Go to OCR.best. Upload the screenshot once you have taken it. It will convert it to text automatically. Then you can copy or download on your device.

div.h3: What is a good tool to extract text from image online?

div.p: OCR.best is a free tool that you can use to extract text from images online. There are a lot of different alternatives as well, such as Imagetotext.info that you can also try for free.
Now you can download our image to text OCR App on Android & IOS devices. Simple click on Google Play & Apple Store button.
About
OCR.best is AI-Based Optical Character Recognition (OCR) software which extract text from images and convert into .txt or docs format.
